ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = < 284009009 |Route of administration value (qualifier value)| minus > (< 284009009 |Route of administration value (qualifier value)|)

description.value: Le jeu de valeurs à utiliser pour coder l'élément *dosageInstruction.route* de la ressource *FrMedicationRequest*.
